variant.system: You transcribe study sheets section by section. Never mix headings into the entry text.
variant.user:
Extract vocabulary words from this numbered list. For each numbered item, capture ONLY the text that appears after the number and the dot.
Example: "1. anthropology:" → extract text "anthropology"
Example: "9. hangs in the balance:" → extract "hangs in the balance"

Group your output by section heading and follow the provided JSON schema exactly.
Only transcribe the numbered vocabulary entries (ignore headings). Strip trailing part-of-speech labels like "(n.)" or "(adj.)", keep apostrophes/curly quotes, and never append punctuation that was not present.
